  • Constructor Details

    • AssetBean

      public AssetBean()

  • Method Details

    • createAsset

      public void createAsset(AssetCreateDto assetCreateDto, jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws DuplicatedAttributeException, UserNotFoundException
      Creates a new asset based on the provided AssetCreateDto and associates it with the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      assetCreateDto - The DTO containing asset information.
      securityContext - The security context providing user authentication details.
      Throws:
      DuplicatedAttributeException - If an asset with the same name already exists.
      UserNotFoundException - If the authenticated user cannot be found in the database.

    • addProjectAssetToProject

      public void addProjectAssetToProject(String name, long projectId, int usedQuantity) throws EntityNotFoundException, ElementAssociationException
      Adds an asset to a project with the specified name and updates associated quantities.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset to add to the project.
      projectId - The ID of the project to which the asset is being added.
      usedQuantity - The quantity of the asset used in the project.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If either the asset or the project cannot be found.
      ElementAssociationException - If the project is in a non-editable state or if the asset is already associated with the project.

    • getAllAssets

      public List<AssetGetDto> getAllAssets()
      Retrieves all assets from the database and converts them into AssetGetDto objects.
      Returns:
      A list of AssetGetDto objects representing all assets.

    • getProjectAssetsByProject

      public List<ProjectAssetGetDto> getProjectAssetsByProject(long projectId)
      Retrieves project assets associated with the specified project ID from the database and converts them into ProjectAssetGetDto objects.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project for which to retrieve assets.
      Returns:
      A list of ProjectAssetGetDto objects representing project assets.

    • getAssetById

      public AssetGetDto getAssetById(long assetId)
      Retrieves an asset from the database by its ID and converts it into an AssetGetDto object.
      Parameters:
      assetId - The ID of the asset to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An AssetGetDto object representing the retrieved asset, or null if not found.

    • getFilteredAssets

      public AssetPaginatedDto getFilteredAssets(int page, int pageSize, jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo) throws InputValidationException
      Retrieves filtered assets based on pagination criteria and converts them into a paginated DTO.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number (1-indexed) of the results to retrieve.
      pageSize - The number of assets per page.
      uriInfo - Additional information about the request URI.
      Returns:
      An AssetPaginatedDto object containing a list of AssetGetDto objects for the current page and total count of assets.
      Throws:
      InputValidationException - If the provided page or pageSize is less than or equal to 0.

    • getAssetsByFirstLetter

      public List<AssetGetDto> getAssetsByFirstLetter(String firstLetter)
      Retrieves assets whose names start with the specified first letter and converts them into AssetGetDto objects. Returns an empty list if the first letter is null or not a single character.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - The first letter of the asset names to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of AssetGetDto objects representing assets whose names start with the specified first letter, or an empty list if no matching assets are found.

    • getEnumListAssetTypes

      public List<AssetTypeEnum> getEnumListAssetTypes()
      Retrieves a list of all AssetTypeEnum values.
      Returns:
      A list containing all AssetTypeEnum values.

    • removeProjectAssetFromProject

      public void removeProjectAssetFromProject(ProjectAssetRemoveDto projectAssetRemoveDto) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Removes an asset from a project by removing the association between the project and the asset. This operation modifies the project's projectAssets set and the asset's projectAssets set accordingly.
      Parameters:
      projectAssetRemoveDto - The DTO containing project and asset IDs to remove the association.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If either the project or the asset with the specified IDs is not found.
      IllegalStateException - If the project does not have the specified asset or if the asset does not have the specified project (which should not happen under normal conditions).

    • updateAsset

      public void updateAsset(AssetUpdateDto assetUpdateDto) throws EntityNotFoundException, InputValidationException
      Updates an existing asset with new information provided in the AssetUpdateDto. Checks for duplicate asset names before updating.
      Parameters:
      assetUpdateDto - The DTO containing updated information for the asset.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the asset with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      InputValidationException - If a duplicate asset name is detected when updating the asset's name.

    • convertAssetEntityToAssetDto

      public AssetGetDto convertAssetEntityToAssetDto(AssetEntity assetEntity)
      Converts an AssetEntity object to an AssetGetDto object.
      Parameters:
      assetEntity - The AssetEntity object to convert.
      Returns:
      The converted AssetGetDto object.

    • convertAssetEntityListToAssetDtoList

      public List<AssetGetDto> convertAssetEntityListToAssetDtoList(List<AssetEntity> assetEntities)
      Converts a list of AssetEntity objects to a list of AssetGetDto objects.
      Parameters:
      assetEntities - The list of AssetEntity objects to convert.
      Returns:
      The list of converted AssetGetDto objects.

    • convertProjectAssetEntityToProjectAssetDto

      public ProjectAssetGetDto convertProjectAssetEntityToProjectAssetDto(ProjectAssetEntity projectAssetEntity)
      Converts a ProjectAssetEntity object to a ProjectAssetGetDto object.
      Parameters:
      projectAssetEntity - The ProjectAssetEntity object to convert.
      Returns:
      The converted ProjectAssetGetDto object.

    • convertProjectAssetEntityListToProjectAssetDtoList

      public List<ProjectAssetGetDto> convertProjectAssetEntityListToProjectAssetDtoList(List<ProjectAssetEntity> projectAssetEntities)
      Converts a list of ProjectAssetEntity objects to a list of ProjectAssetGetDto objects.
      Parameters:
      projectAssetEntities - The list of ProjectAssetEntity objects to convert.
      Returns:
      The list of converted ProjectAssetGetDto objects.
